Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
A research colony has gone dark, the Vanguard launch a dire rescue mission.
一个研究殖民地失去了联系，先锋发起了一场严峻的营救任务。

Commander’s Personal Record: Vanguard LCVP-86 emerged from Void Space intact. Our destination is a small planet located near to the anomaly in this system. Scans are showing nothing but static from the research outpost below. The distress call we received remains the only sign of life.
指挥官个人记录：先锋 LCVP-86 毫发无伤地从虚空中出现。我们的目的地是一个位于这个星系中异常现象发生地附近的一个小星球。除了下方研究前哨发出的静电之外，扫描结果中没有其他任何信息。我们收到的求救信号是证明这里有生命存在的唯一迹象。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

The Void Anomaly looms over the planet like a dark omen. These scientists must have been mad to study the phenomenon from this close, but it’s not for me to question their motives. We’re here to secure a foothold, search for any survivors and investigate what happened. Prepare for Planetfall.
虚空异常如同黑暗的预兆笼罩着这个星球。这些科学家一定是疯了才会靠这么近来研究这一现象，不过我也没有资格质疑他们的动机。我们要在这里建立一个据点，搜寻任何幸存者，调查发生的事情。准备星球着陆。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

We barely escaped the surface of the planet before the Void Anomaly consumed it. We’re lucky to have gotten the colonists out alive. These last few days have left me filled with more questions than answers. What happened on the surface here? What was that gravitronic wave that ripped through this star cluster?
我们差一点就没能在虚空异常吞噬星球表面之前离开这里。幸运的是，我们已成功将移住民撤离了出来。这些天以来的遭遇不仅没让我找到答案，反倒让我有了更多疑问。这里的星球地表到底发生了什么？那阵席卷这个星团的引力波又是什么？
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

Well it looks like we’ll have plenty of time to sleep on this. The gravitronic force destabilized the Void Rift in this system, making faster-than-light travel impossible. We have to get home the old-fashioned way - it will take us close to 200 years to reach the nearest Star Union hub. I have ordered everyone to prepare for cryosleep. We will see what kind of world we wake up to.
嗯，看来我们将会有充足的时间来解决这个问题。引力使这个星系的虚空裂隙动荡不已，也使得我们没法进行超光速穿越。我们不得不用老方法回家，但这几乎需要花费 200 年的时间才能抵达最近的星际联盟中心。我已经命令所有人做好冷冻休眠的准备，我们很好奇当我们醒来后将面对一个怎样的世界。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
After 200 years of cryosleep, the Vanguard face a cataclysmic homecoming.
经过 200 年的冷冻休眠后，先锋面临灾难式的回归。

Commander’s Personal Record: Vanguard Expeditionary Forces. Cryosleep cycle completed – no casualties. Time since launch: 197 years. We’re finally back. After a storm destroyed our hyperspace passage we had to take the long way around. Most of us joined the Vanguard to escape our past. Two centuries should be enough to give everybody a clean slate.
指挥官个人记录：先锋远征部队。冷冻休眠循环完成，无人员伤亡。冷冻休眠已执行时间：197 年。我们终于回来了。一场风暴摧毁了我们的超太空通道，我们不得不经过长途跋涉才能回家。加入先锋的大部分人都是为了逃避过往。两个世纪应该足够所有人从头再来了。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

Time to contact Vanguard Central Command. We are heading for Leave-6, the military transit hub in this section of the Borderlands. The crew is already speculating about visiting the Elysium Parks: gambling, booze, and promiscuous androids… Oh well, after two centuries of sleep it’s time for some fun!
是时候联系先锋中央指挥委员会了。我们要前往离别 6 号星球，那里是边境之地的军事交通枢纽。队员们都在憧憬着参观极乐公园：赌博，酒水还有各种机器人…啊，太棒了，睡了两百年终于可以找点乐子！
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

Something is wrong. We have reached the Leave-6 star system, but instead of Orbital Patrol there was only scattered wreckage awaiting our arrival. While searching for survivors, we spotted a ship of unknown configuration. Entering the planet’s atmosphere it ignored our hails. Residual void interference prevents us from scanning the surface.
情况有些不对。我们已经抵达离别 6 号星球星系，但是轨道巡队都不见了，迎接我们的只是一片残骸。搜寻幸存者的时候，我们发现了一个未知配置的飞船。进入星球大气的时候，它无视了我们的搭讪。残余的虚空干扰让我们无法扫描星球地表。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

The Elysium Parks must wait. We have a new mission: We need to assess the strategic situation on Leave-6, contact Vanguard Central Command – and help them clean up this mess. Prepare for Planetfall! For the Vanguard! And for the Union!
极乐公园的事必须得缓一缓了。我们有了一个新任务：我们需要评估离别 6 号星球的战略情况，联系先锋中央指挥委员会，帮他们清理这个烂摊子。准备星球着陆！为了先锋！为了联盟！
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
Find out what happened on the Planet
查明星球上发生的事情。

Although the crisis on Leave 6 has come to an end, the fate of the Star Union remains uncertain. Why have no other imperial ships arrived since the Void Storms began to subside? Also, why could Sina act so ruthlessly, blatantly disregarding civil rule? I fear the chaos and destruction we encountered here is only the beginning.
虽然离别 6 号星球的危机已经结束，但星际联盟的命运仍然未知。虚空风暴已经逐渐开始平息，但为什么没有其他帝国飞船前来呢？还有，为什么希娜会表现得如此冷酷，公然亵渎文明法规？恐怕我们遇到的毁灭和混乱仅仅只是一个开始而已。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

To rise like a phoenix from the ashes. This is how the Prometheans used to embellish their mass-murdering and destruction. I always despised them for their methods, but in difficult times like these, their technology can be useful. Even if the Syndicate aren’t part of a greater Outlander invasion force, I must prepare for the next time we meet. They wish to play with fire? They shall have it!
像凤凰从灰烬中重生那样崛起。圣火使者用这样的说辞来美化他们大规模的屠杀和破坏。我一直很鄙视他们的处事方式，不过现在正处于危难时刻，他们的科技将派上用场。即使辛迪加不是拓荒者入侵部队中的大头，我也必须为下一次见面做好准备。他们想玩火？那就给他们点火瞧瞧！
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
An Amazon aspirant must track down her mentor on an infected jungle world.
一名雄心壮志的亚马逊人必须在一个被感染的丛林世界中找到她导师的下落。

When society collapses, only the fittest survive. The fall of the Star Union cast us Amazons into the jungle – and we tamed it. Genetic modification, cognitive training and stringent discipline are the tools of selection which turned us from prey into predators. As such, we impose nature’s law as our own, adapting the environment and its wildlife to our ideals.
当社会轰然崩塌时，只有适者才能存活。星际联盟的陨落把我们亚马逊人驱逐到了丛林之中，不过我们驯服了它。基因改造、认知训练以及严格的纪律是选择的工具，让我们从猎物变成了猎人。正因如此，我们把自然的法则视作我们自己的法则，适应环境和野生生物，达到最理想的状态。

There are still many worlds in need of the caring hand of the Amazons. With our terraforming equipment, we bring new life to barren planets and grow them into lush gardens. But the harmony we create requires fostering. Pests must be culled and trespassers caught. I was raised and trained as an Amazon Matriarch. We are the shield and spear protecting that order.
还有很多世界需要亚马逊人的精心呵护。有了地形转变装备，我们便可以为贫瘠的星球带去新的生命，让这些星球成为葱郁的花园。但我们所创造的这种和谐需要精心培养。必须剔除害虫，抓捕入侵者。我从小就以亚马逊族长的身份接受养育和训练。我们就是保护秩序的矛与盾。

My old mentor, Berhane Katla, has become a threat to our cause. She overstepped the boundaries set for manipulating the Amazon genetic makeup, and was declared a renegade after refusing to face her trial. I have been tasked with hunting Berhane down. It is my acid test, the last proof of strength before completing my Matriarch training.
我的老导师勃海因·卡特拉对我们的事业造成了威胁。她越过了亚马逊人基因组成的界限，并在拒绝接受审判后背叛了我们。我已经接到抓捕勃海因的任务，这将是我在完成族长训练前证明我实力的最后一次决定性考验。

Female only
Berhane Katla - Female Amazon character
We have tracked Berhane to a planet called Thanakiwa. She will know better than to expect mercy from her former protegé, so we have to prepare for maximum resistance.
我们已经在一颗名叫瑟纳基瓦的星球上找到了勃海因的踪迹。她不会向她先前的学生请求宽恕的，所以我们一定要做好迎接顽强抵抗的准备。

Even though we arrived too late to confront Berhane in person, we were still able to foil her plans and contain the effects of her Xenoplague experiments. Berhane should have faced me while she still had the advantage: Now that we have survived first contact with her parasitic weapon, we can study it and adapt our strategies accordingly.
虽然我们来得太晚没能见到勃海因，但我们还是破坏了她的计划并且抑制住了异星疫病实验的效果。勃海因应该趁她还有优势的时候就与我对峙：现在，既然我们已经在初次遭遇寄生武器的战斗中存活了下来，我们便可以研究这些武器，然后对我们的策略进行相应的调整。
In an icy wasteland two Dvar Consortia compete for the riches of a forgotten world.
两个矮人财团正在一片冰冷的废土上争夺失落世界的财富。

Explosions are the masters of creation. The Big Bang forged the universe, and the Cataclysm carved the Dvar. Deprivation and seclusion did not hurt our miner ancestors. It only ignited the strength and craving for resources that still drive our kind forward. Now, under the watchful eye of the Adamant Council, the Dvar Consortia are locked in ruthless competition. Prestige and infinite riches versus poverty and eternal shame are our new stakes.
爆炸是创造的大师。大爆炸成就了宇宙，而大灾变刻画了矮人。贫困和与世隔绝并没有对我们的矿工先祖造成影响。相反，这点燃了我们的斗志，激发了我们对资源的渴望，并且仍然驱动着我们的族人不断向前。如今，在坚毅委员会的严格监管下，矮人财团陷入了残酷的竞争。要么得到威望与无尽的财富，要么一贫如洗永远活在耻辱之下，这就是我们的赌注。
Adamant Council' is like the government for the Dvar
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

I am the head of the Zhelezo Dvar Consortium. Before my rule, our house was weak and complacent with its position. I sparked ambition in my people. The Zhelezo Dvar rose rapidly in station, but the Adamant Council still looked down on us. Today everything changes. Our prospectors have found the resource-rich world of Chimera Glacialis. Once the Council grants us mining rights, the Zhelezo Consortium will finally attain the status it deserves.
我是泽勒佐矮人财团的领袖。在我上任前，我的家族十分弱小而且还对自己的处境自鸣得意。我激发了我们人民的雄心壮志。泽勒佐矮人在站点内飞速崛起，然而坚毅委员会还是看不起我们。现在一切都改变了，我们的勘探者找到了资源丰富的奇美拉冰川世界。一旦委员会授予我们开采矿产的权利后，泽勒佐财团终将获得它应有的地位。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

The Council is demented! Those bumbling fools granted our claim to the disreputable Rassvet Consortium. We found this world. By traditional claimant rights, it should be ours. It’s clear to me that the Council will never trust us, so we must carve our own path. They will not stand in the way of the Zhelezo, and neither will Valodny Rassvet!
委员会疯了！这些蠢蛋竟然把本该属于我们的东西给了声名狼藉的拉斯维特财团。是我们发现了这个星球，根据传统索取权，这个星球应该是我们的。很明显，委员会永远都不会相信我们，所以我们必须自己开辟道路了。泽勒佐财团绝不会被委员会和瓦洛迪尼·拉斯维特阻碍！

'Rassvet' is a clan name
'Valodny Rassvet' male dvar character
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

The world of Chimera Glacialis lies below us, its stormy exterior hiding riches just ripe for plunder. As we descend, these storms will interfere with our ship's navigation systems. I doubt it will be the last obstacle hiding this planet's secrets.
奇美拉冰川世界就在我们下方，它猛烈的风暴外表下隐藏着巨大的财富，开采的时机已经成熟。当我们下降时，风暴肯定会干扰我们飞船的导航系统。要想揭开这个星球隐藏的秘密，恐怕这道难关只是一个开头而已。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar
Claim the resources of Chimera Glacialis
对付维洛迪尼·拉斯维特

The Vault we uncovered has repaid all of the blood, sweat and tears we shed for this expedition. This impressive bounty of Cosmite will surely appease the Adamant Council and prove our worth. The excavation of Chimera Glacialis has proven as profitable for the Zhelezo as we had projected. Mining operations are running at peak efficiency. The Rassvet consortium is no longer an obstacle.
我们发掘的宝库弥补了我们为这次探险所付出的血水、汗水与泪水。数量如此可观的宇宙合金肯定能让坚毅委员会满意并由此证明我们的价值。正如我们预计的那样，奇美拉冰川的发掘工作给泽勒佐财团带来了极大的财富。矿采行动正在高效进行，拉斯维特财团将不再是阻碍。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

Although we have lost the Vault and its Cosmite riches, the excavation of Chimera Glacialis has proven as profitable for the Zhelezo as we had projected. Mining operations are running at peak efficiency. The Rassvet consortium is no longer a problem, and we have proven our rightful claim to this world.
虽然我们失去了宝库和其中的宇宙合金宝藏，但奇美拉冰川的发掘工作正如我们预计的那样，使泽勒佐财团获得了极大的利益。矿采行动正在高效进行，拉斯维特财团将不再是阻碍。我们已经证明了我们才是这个星球的所有者。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

The hammer has fallen. We received the transmission this morning: the Zhelezo Consortium and all its associates have been exiled, any contact with them forbidden by the Adamant Council. This is an outrage! Other Consortia have been forgiven for worse transgressions. No… it is clear that the Council fears our return. They fear their corruption getting exposed, and I am willing to bet my last filter that these ‘Redeemers’ will lead me to it.
重锤已经堕落。今天早上我们收到了一条传输讯息：泽勒佐财团及其所有同党已遭到放逐，坚毅委员会禁止任何形式的接触。这简直令人愤怒！曾经犯下更糟糕罪行的其他财团都得到了原谅。不…委员会明显是害怕我们的回归，害怕我们会揭露他们的堕落。我愿用我最后一个过滤器作赌注，这些“救赎者”将指引我们找到答案。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar
While searching the ruins of the past, the Vanguard stir up old and new enemies.
先锋在古老的废墟中四处搜寻时吸引了宿敌和一些新敌人的注意。

The presence of the Syndicate on Leave-6 troubles me. My gut tells me something shady lurks beneath their fake smiles. I still remember the pictures of the psionic experiments every senior officer had to be briefed on before an assignment within the Borderlands. Just thinking about the horrors depicted there caused the most grizzled veterans to shudder.
辛迪加人出现在离别 6 号星球一事让我很焦虑。我的内心告诉我，在他们虚假的笑面之下肯定潜藏着一些不可告人的秘密。我仍然记得每一位高级军官在被派往边境之地前都必须了解观看的那些灵能实验的画面。仅是想一下那些场景都能使经验最丰富的老兵颤抖不已。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

During our encounter with Sina, we discovered her next target. Among the millions of planets in this galaxy, it had to be Sorinus Alpha, the Union’s shining jewel of science and progress – and witness of my life’s bitterest moments. That’s all in the past though, going to Sorinus Alpha will finally shed light on our situation. If the Star Union is in any kind of trouble we will learn about it there, one way or another.
我们在与希娜碰面的时候发现了她的下一个目标。在星系无数的星球中，也只有可能是索里努斯阿尔法星了。那里既是星际联盟科技与进步的璀璨明珠，也是我度过一生中最艰苦岁月的地方。虽然那都是过去的事了，但前往索里努斯阿尔法星肯定可以帮助我们认清现在的情形。无论如何，我们都将在那里了解星际联盟是否遇到了麻烦。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
We approach Sorinus Alpha. We don’t know what to expect on the surface, so I’ve told my men to prepare for the worst.
我们即将抵达索里努斯阿尔法星。我们不知道在星球上会遇到什么，所以我已经让我的部下做好了最坏的打算。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
Uncover the fate of the Star Union

There lies Sorinus Alpha. What was once a metropolitan world breathing with life is reduced to a burnt-out carcass. It is a chilling site to see the aftermath of the PyrX inferno; one that I’ll never forget. The only thing making this bearable is the affirmation that an even bigger catastrophe has been prevented today. True freedom requires sacrifice.
那就是索里努斯阿尔法星。它曾是一个生机勃勃的首府星球，如今却被烧成了废墟。目睹派尔克斯火焰造成的后果实在令人不寒而栗，这一幕我永远也不会忘记。唯一可以让人舒心的是，今天一场更加巨大的灾难已被阻止。真正的自由需要牺牲。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

While with the resurrection of Emperor Tholian the conflict on Sorinus Alpha may have come to an early end, the battle for the legacy of the Star Union has just been started. It seems that both Tholian and Carminia, the Syndicate and the Assembly all have their own visions for the future. But in the end it is us, the people, whose support they seek, who will decide this conflict with our actions.
虽然随着帝皇托利安的复活在索里努斯阿尔法星上爆发的冲突早已结束，但争夺星际联盟遗产的战斗才刚刚打响。托利安、凯米尼亚、辛迪加人和半机械人似乎都有其各自的未来愿景。但最后将会是我们这些为他们提供支持的人，用我们自己的行动来决定这场冲突的结果。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard

With the extradition of Emperor Tholian, his cult and plans to overthrow the old order of CORE are history. My promotion represents the righteous reestablishment of the Star Union. Without CORE the Star Union would have risked another Cataclysm. Factions like the New Horizon must be put down for the greater good.
随着帝皇托利安的离去，他的追随者和推翻核心旧秩序的计划已成为了历史。我的晋升代表着星际联盟正义的重建。假如没有核心，星际联盟将陷入另一场大灾变。为了更大的利益着想，必须阻止像新地平线这样的阵营。
VO: Male Vanguard or Female Vanguard
In an ever-shifting environment the Amazon must adapt to withstand their ruthless enemy.
亚马逊人在不断变化的环境中必须适应与残忍的敌人对抗。

Before leaving Thanakiwa we found data pads left behind by Berhane’s research team. On the pads the extent of her experiments was clearly documented: Berhane is grafting Alpha Strain DNA onto embryonic Amazon stem cells, trying to create a new race of Xeno-Amazons. This is not mere treason! This is an abomination against nature!
在离开瑟纳基瓦前，我们发现了勃海因研究队遗留下来的数据板，上面清晰记录了她们的实验进展：勃海因正在把初始毒株的基因移植到亚马逊胚胎干细胞上，想要创造出新的异星疫病亚马逊人种。这不仅仅是背叛！这是违背自然法则的恶劣行径！

It is clear now why Berhane has been moving her operations to Avium SK-51. With its extreme geographic conditions and prebuild laboratories, the old Terratech testing site provides the perfect setting for someone trying to breed a super-race. More than enough reason for us to get there before she can make herself comfortable and set up defenses.
现在总算明白勃海因为何要把行动转移到阿维姆 SK-51 号星上去了。极端的地理条件加上早已修建的实验室，那里的泰拉科技实验旧址能够为那些想要培养超级物种的人提供完美的条件。我们已经有了充足的理由，必须在她安定下来并做好防御工事前抵达那里。
Avium SK-51 lies ahead. Initial scans confirmed that Berhane made a landing on the planet. We have tracked and cornered our prey. Now it is time to go for the kill!
阿维姆 SK-51 号星就在前面。经初步扫描确认，勃海因曾在这个星球着陆。我们已经找到了猎物并把她逼入了绝境。现在是时候消灭她了！
Bring an end to the Amazon conflict

As of today, Berhane and her morbid experiments are no more. Thus concludes my initiation as Amazon Matriarch. I know now that harsh actions are needed to protect the natural equilibrium that we Amazons bring to every world. In our gardens bad weeds must be expunged and pests destroyed. Harmony requires sacrifice.
从今天起，勃海因和她那些疯狂的实验将不复存在了。我也因此完成了亚马逊族长的上任试炼。现在我已明白，要保护我们给每个世界所创造的自然平衡，就必须采取严厉的行为，必须消灭我们花园里的杂草和害虫。要想实现和谐，就必须要有牺牲。
Wronged and exiled, the Dvar seek to redeem themselves with a big bang.
遭到放逐和不公平对待的矮人想要制造一场大变革来挽回他们的形象。

The past few months have taken a toll on us all. Exiled by the Council, the Zhelezo Dvar needed new impulses, and I was asked to take over as Director of our Consortium. I will not rest until the true motives of the Adamant Council are uncovered and the Zhelezo name is restored. To this end, I have followed the Redeemers to a planet called Zemestian-4.
过去几个月对我们所有人都造成了严重的影响。遭到委员会放逐的泽勒佐矮人需要新的动力，而我则接任为了我们财团的领袖。在查明坚毅委员会的真实动机并挽回泽勒佐财团的名声之前，我绝不会停歇。为了实现这一目的，我跟随救赎者来到了一个名叫泽摩斯蒂安-4 的星球。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

The database footage of Zemestian-4’s surface reveals its rich landscape. As Dvar, we are used to exploiting nature, but have forgotten its beauty – from within our suits the outside world feels unapproachable and lifeless. Using the Alpha Strain, I have been studying, I may be able to liberate my people from their self-made prisons and allow them to breathe the fresh, unfiltered air again.
泽摩斯蒂安-4 号星球的地表数据库影像呈现出了多种多样的地形景观。身为矮人，我们习惯开发利用自然，但我们已经遗忘了它的美好。因为身穿制服，外面的世界对我们而言显得无法触及并且毫无生机。也许我能利用一直以来我都在研究的初始毒株把我的人民从他们自制的牢狱中解放出来，让他们可以再次呼吸到未经过滤的新鲜空气。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

Zemestian-4 lies below us. The world is as beautiful as the old records claim… and every bit as unstable. Since the Redeemers fled to this world, we can only presume they want to consult with their masters. We will track them down. We must find the root of this corruption and clear the name of the Zhelezo Dvar at any cost.
泽摩斯蒂安-4 号星球就在我们下方。这个星球就像就记录中描述的那样美丽…而且每个部分都确实不太稳定。既然救赎者逃到了这个星球，我们只能推测他们是想与他们的主人交谈。我们将一路追踪他们，必须找到堕落的根源，不惜一切代价为泽勒佐矮人正名。
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar
泽摩斯蒂安-4 号星球
Uncover the corruption of the Council
找到委员会堕落的原因

We have destroyed the Proton Coil and prevented its completion. Never should such a powerful weapon be allowed in the hands of a cold, calculating being like Claudius Proton. With that threat averted and the name of the Zhelezo Dvar cleared, our Consortium will finally receive the deserved respect from the Adamant Council!
我们已经摧毁了质子线圈，如此强大的武器绝不能落到像克劳迪亚斯·普罗顿那样冷血而精于算计的人手中。如今威胁已经解除，泽勒佐矮人也恢复了名声，坚毅委员会终将给予我们财团应得的尊重！
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar

The Proton Coil stood silent. It recalibrated, charged… and fired! A strike of lightning and thunder, worthy of any Dvar weapon. Now the Council’s traitors and their allies are no more, lost in another dimension. But the proof of their corruption will end our time of exile. At last, the Zhelezo will have the respect we deserve!
质子线圈静静地矗立在那里。校正，充能…然后发射！电闪雷鸣，火光四射，能够与任何矮人武器媲美。虽然如今委员会的叛徒及其同党全都永远消失在了另一个维度，但他们堕落的证据将结束我们的流放。最后，泽勒佐矮人将获得我们应有的尊重！
VO: Male Dvar or Female Dvar
Still haunted by their past, the freed Kir'Ko seek a new future for their race.
获得了自由的奇尔寇仍然被过去的阴霾所困扰，想要为自己的种族打造新的未来。

For centuries, the Kir’Ko had to suffer at the hands of our human oppressors. They feared our psionic abilities, feared us because we were different. So they enslaved us, mutilated our ancestors, whose tormented memories still echo in the minds of the living. But the Kir’Ko are resilient. We evolved without the severed Hive until we finally broke free from our shackles.
数个世纪以来，奇尔寇在人类的压迫下受尽了苦难。他们害怕我们的灵能之力，害怕我们与他们的不同。所以他们将我们奴役，残害我们的先祖。先祖们饱受折磨的记忆至今还在我们活着的同胞脑海中回响。但奇尔寇坚韧顽强。即使被切断了与蜂巢的联系，我们仍然不断进化，最终从束缚中挣脱了出来。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

As Swarm Herald of the Kir’Ko Terym, I have been chosen to lead my colony to a new place to settle, a new place to call home. This is a heavy burden, as we are confronted with our past in every corner of the former Star Union. With the unity of the hive mind gone, different voices have risen amongst our people. Some are seeking vengeance, while others like myself feel that we need to build our own future, away from mankind and human conflicts.
身为奇尔寇特瑞姆部落的族群使者，我被选中带领我的族群去往新的地方，去往一个我们可以称之为家的地方安顿下来。这是一项重担，因为我们无论去到哪里，都总能到曾经星际联盟的影子。统一的蜂巢意志消失后，我们的族群中响起了不同的声音。他们有的想要寻求复仇，而有的像我这样的同胞则觉得我们应该远离人类和冲突，创造我们自己的未来。
Terym' is the name of a Kir'Ko tribe
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

Our search has been fruitless for some time now, and the dreams of my ancestors have been growing darker inside of me as a result. I am in need of guidance to understand their meaning and to not succumb to the black emptiness they project around me. To this end, I have followed the tracks of the fabled Dream Reader Hatyl Ur’Uk to a planet the humans call Arcadia Caeleste.
我们的搜寻已经有好一段时间没有任何进展了，先祖们的梦境也因此在我的心中变得越来越黑暗。我需要指引才能理解他们的意图，否则我将屈服于他们在我身边呈现的黑暗虚无之中。为此，我尾随一位寓言中的解梦者哈泰尔·乌鲁克，来到了一个被人类称作阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特的星球。

Dream Reader' is a title
'Hatyl Ur’Uk' is a male Kir'Ko
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

The dreams of my ancestors pass violently through my mind, evoking a new sense of power within me. I left all past restraints behind and painted the future in scarlet red. With the location of Xa’Kir’Ko rediscovered, there are buzzing times ahead for my people. When we reclaim our heritage, we will reunite as one, a vast swarm hungering to devour anyone foolish enough to stand in its way.
先祖们的梦境在我脑海中猛然掠过，在我体内唤起了一股新的力量。我把过去的束缚都抛诸脑后，绘制出了血红色的未来。随着札奇尔寇的位置被重新发现，我的族群兴奋不已，蓄势待发。当我们夺回遗产之时，我们将重新团结成一个整体，一个渴望吞噬一切阻碍的庞大族群。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

The dreams of my ancestors pass quietly through my mind, filling me with newfound calm. I am at peace with the past, and the future glitters in a delightful scarab blue. With the location of Xa’Kir’Ko rediscovered, there are prolific times ahead for my people. Soon we will gaze at its fuchsia seas, listen to its soft melodies and absorb its boggy moisture, as we tread the paths of our forefathers.
先祖们的梦境在我脑海中悄然掠过，使我沉浸在新生的宁静当中。我放下了过去，未来正闪烁出甲虫般蓝色的光芒。随着札奇尔寇的位置被重新发现，繁盛的未来正等待着我的族群。只要我们追随先祖们的道路，不久我们就能看见紫红色的海洋，聆听舒缓的旋律，吸收沼泽的水分。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

Arcadia Caeleste lies ahead of us. I can feel it reaching out, a soothing presence bringing calm to the turmoil of the swarm. No wonder Hatyl Ur’Uk was drawn here. This may be the place of tranquility we’ve all been longing for.
阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特星就在前面。我能感受到一股力量向我们伸展来，那是一股抚慰心灵的力量，给混乱的族群带来了平静。难怪哈泰尔·乌鲁克会被吸引至此，这里可能就是我们渴望已久的宁静之地。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko
An ambitious Syndicate House craves the secrets of a forbidden planet.
一个野心勃勃的辛迪加家族渴求解开某个禁忌星球上的秘密。
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.5/1
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.5/1

The universe was created with two kinds of creatures in mind: The ones that rule and the ones that serve. For generations, the Syndicate houses were the ones to rule, until the emperors grew envious of our wealth and robbed us of our heritage. Now, with the Star Union gone, a new age of Syndicate hegemony is at its dawn. Our associates may not always find our offers appealing, but they rarely complain – not successfully anyway.
宇宙建立时只有两个物种：一个是统治者，另一个则是侍奉者。历代以来，辛迪加家族一直都是统治者，直到那些帝皇开始嫉妒我们的财富并掠夺了我们的遗产。现在，星际联盟已经不复存在，新的辛迪加霸权时代即将来临。我们的提议可能并不总是能够使我们的合伙人满意，但他们也不会抱怨，反正抱怨也没用。[br/]
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.5/2
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.5/2

Since the passing of my brother in an unfortunate accident, it has become my duty and privilege to lead House Ny'dar through these eventful times. There are rumors of House Timur falling from grace, leaving a vacancy in the Ruling Seven that many will intend to fill.
自从我的哥哥在一场不幸的意外中丧生，带领奈达尔家族度过这段多事之秋就成为了我的职责和特权。传闻提穆尔家族跌落了神坛，政统七族之位出现了空缺，许多家族都觊觎着这个位置。
Ruling Seven' is the Syndicate government
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.5/3
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.5/3

Over the course of the past few weeks, our Hackers have tapped into the communication relays of our fiercest competitors, sending some rather volatile, falsified diplomatic messages in their names. That should keep them busy fighting amongst each other for a while. Time that we need to draw up our plans.
过去几周时间里，我们的黑客侵入了与我们竞争最激烈的几个竞争者通讯继电器，并以他们的名义发送了一些能够引发动荡的伪造外交讯息。这应该能使他们相互之间争上一阵子了，我们可以趁这段时间草拟我们的计划了。
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.5/4
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.5/4

An old associate of mine, Zul Nadjian, has contacted me. He claims to have found a source of power that will assure House Ny'dar's place in the Ruling Seven. It is an ancient secret sealed away on a planet whose entire records have been wiped from the old Imperial Archives. Zul has proven to be a reliable source in the past, so I have decided to personally take care of this matter.
我昔日的一名旧盟友祖尔·纳德伊安与我取得了联系，他说他发现了一种能源，保证能够使奈达尔家族在政统七族中获得一席之地。这是个古老的秘密，任何关于尘封着它的星球的记录已经被从老的帝国档案中删得一干二净。但以往的合作经验表明祖尔是一名可靠的线人，所以我打算亲自处理这件事。
Zul Nadjian' is a male Syndicate character
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-02.1/1
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-02.1/1

The unnamed planet lies before us, its surface still shrouded by atmospheric clouds. My instincts tell me that Zul was right and House Ny’dar’s future fortune is buried somewhere down there. It is only a matter of finding the right shovel to dig it up.
那个无名的星球就在我们前方，星球表面仍然笼罩在大气云层下面。我的直觉告诉我祖尔没有说谎，奈达尔家族未来的财富就埋藏在这里的某个地方，我们只需要找到正确的工具把它挖出来。
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Establish a foothold on the planet's surface
Locate the device promised by Zul
定位祖尔所说的设备位置
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-03.12/3
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-03.12/3

The risks and investments of the past few months have finally paid off. Zul’s merging with the ancient Avatar has created a dangerously powerful entity. Its vast knowledge and abilities to access and take over entire computer networks are weapons that the enemies of House Ny’dar will learn to fear.
过去几个月的风险与投入终于得到了回报。祖尔与古老化身的结合制造出了一个危险而强大的实体。它进入和控制整个计算机网络的广博知识与能力，将会成为奈达尔家族的敌人所惧怕的武器。
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Within the littered vestiges of an empire, the Assembly seek a link to their idol of perfection.
半机械人在某个散乱的帝国遗迹中想要与他们完美的崇拜者建立连接。
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.4.854
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.4.854

In my human years, I was fascinated by robots. When I was touched by CORE its perfection added to my own. Next to it I was small, insignificant, and my attempts as a scientist to eradicate my human flaws failed. After the Cataclysm, I was given new life. From battered flesh and twisted steel, the Assembly rose and I was resurrected as one of our First. Destruction leads to life. Reassembly to evolution. Chaos brings order and death immortality.
当我还是人类的时候，我非常痴迷于机器人。当核心触碰我时，它的完美成为了我的一部分。站在它的旁边，我是多么的微不足道，渺小不堪。身为一名科学家，我想要根除自己人类缺陷的尝试失败了。大灾变之后，我被赋予了新生。半机械人从残破的肉体和扭曲的钢铁中崛起，而我则复活并成为了一名初代半机械人。毁灭带来新生，改造带来进化，混乱带来秩序，死亡带来永生。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.4.859
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.4.859

Ever since our creation, we have been longing for CORE, which had been lost to us after the Cataclysm. CORE is the voice of perfection, and connecting to it entails forming part of ultimate order. Now that the Void Storms have subsided, we have pledged to it our allegiance. Together we will reconstruct the Star Union in the shape of the Assembly: A society unbothered by ethical conflict, ignorance, disease, war or death.
我们自从被创造以来就一直渴望核心，因为大灾变之后我们失去了与它的连接。核心是完美之声，想要与它连接需要形成终极秩序的一部分。现在虚空风暴已经平息，我们也已经向核心誓忠。团结起来，我们将以半机械人的方式重建星际联盟，这将是一个没有伦理冲突、没有无知、没有疾病、没有战争和死亡的社会。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.4.864
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.4.864

Following CORE’s instructions, we are on our way to recover a Neural Plexus located on Gardip XX. In the Star Union such a device allowed the Emperors to act as a mind-bridge between CORE and the Paragon, connecting them to millions of individuals at once. It was required on all Star Holder vessels. One such ship, the ‘Atirah’, was sent to Gardip XX for deconstruction only few days before the Cataclysm. Salvaging it will be an appropriate task for our Scavengers.
按照核心的指示，我们正前往伽迪普二十号星球拿回那里的神经丛。在星际联盟时期，这种设备可以让帝皇成为核心与完人的意识桥梁，将他们与无数个体同时连接在一起。所有星主飞船上都需要安装这样的设备。就在大灾变降临的几天前，一艘名为“亚蒂拉”的星主飞船被送往了伽迪普二十号星球进行解构。找到并回收神经丛对我们的清道夫而言将会是一个非常适合的任务。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.4.865
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.4.865

When we entered the system, we found the Stabilizers at the Void Rift still intact. The probability of their destruction during the Cataclysm was 99.98%, so somebody must have recently repaired them. L0G3N-8 will be pleased. He has been waiting for more human subjects to process since the Reassembly of Nerion Gamma.
当我们进入系统时，我们发现虚空裂隙中的稳定器竟仍然完好无损。这些设备在大灾变期间被毁坏的几率为 99.98%，所以一定是最近有人修好了它们。L0G3N-8 会很高兴的，自从尼里昂伽玛星的改造之后，他就一直希望处理更多的人类对象。

L0G3N-8 male Assembly
Nerion Gamma is a planet
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.6.143
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.6.143

Though the betrayal of L0G3N-1 was unexpected, it will only be a temporary setback. The fusion of man and machine will prove to be superior and an end to conflict. While our augmented brains may already surpass purely biological entities on many fronts, the organic brain still holds untapped potential. On Gardip XX, we have witnessed the use of Psionics in different forms. The Celestian Path will help us further our quest for universal assimilation.
虽然没想到 L0G3N-1 会背叛我们，但这不过是暂时的挫败而已。人类和机器的融合将会证明其优越并结束这场争端。虽然我们经过强化的大脑在很多方面可能超越了那些纯生物实体的智慧，但有机体的大脑中仍然存在许多有待开发的潜力。我们在伽迪普二十号星球上看到了不同形态的灵能使用方式，星神之路将进一步帮助我们完成宇宙同化的任务。
札奇尔寇 - 奇尔寇后续任务
Returning home, the Kir'Ko find their legacy tainted and rigged by unwelcomed guests.
回到家园的奇尔寇发现他们的遗产遭到了一群不速之客的污染和破坏。

All castes of the Kir’Ko rejoice as today we land on Xa'Kir'Ko! From the humble Hidden to the majestic Harbinger, every individual of the swarm is sharpening their senses to re-embrace our ancient home world. Many colonies have answered my call, and our fleet has been constantly growing with new arrivals since we departed Arcadia Caeleste.
所有奇尔寇都沉浸在欣喜之中，因为我们今天在札奇尔寇着陆了！从卑微的隐匿者到威严的先驱者，族群中的所有个体都迫不及待地想要重新拥抱我们古老的家园星球。很多殖民地都响应了我的号召。自从我们离开阿卡迪亚凯勒斯特后，我们的队伍就随着新加入的同伴而不断壮大。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

This return will mark the beginning of a new era for the Kir’Ko. As we reunite and reclaim our heritage, we cast off the last shackles from the Zok’Shiar and take the fate of our race into our own claws. In ancient times, the Kir’Ko swarm channeled its thoughts through the Ez’Qi’Yu, the Queen of Queens. There are rumors of another Swarm Herald trying to bring back the Queen - and our lost Hive along with her.
这次回归标志着奇尔寇新时代的开始。只要我们重新团结在一起，夺回我们的遗产，我们将摆脱大屠杀的最后一道枷锁，让族群的命运掌握在我们自己的手中。以前，奇尔寇族群通过至高女皇艺姿羽来引导我们的思想。传闻另一名族群使者正努力让至高女皇回归并夺回我们失去的蜂巢。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

Xa’Kir’Ko lies ahead, a celestial body encircled by mists of Cosmite and stardust. What wonders and ancient mysteries will be awaiting us on the surface? Let us descend and have every step we take be a journey into the secrets of our past![br/][br/]Xa’Kir’Ko, your hatchlings are returning home.
被层层宇宙合金和星尘包围的美丽星球札奇尔寇就在前方，地面上会有怎样的奇观和古老谜团在等待着我们？降落吧，我们踏出的每一步都会成为这次揭开过往秘密之旅的一部分！[br/][br/]札奇尔寇，你的子孙后代回来了。
Your' refers to the player's avatar. Can be either male or female.
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

At last! Swarm Seer Cekto Xa’To was right! The genetic structure of the Ez’Qi’Yu has been revealed, her DNA imprinted in the ancestral stem of a nurtured Harbinger. And now the Hive Queen returns to her people! She shapes the swarm, the swarm shapes her… our united will…[br/][br/]We are Kir’Ko!
终于！族群先知瑟克托·札托没有说错！艺姿羽的基因构造已被揭露，她的基因被烙印在了一位培育的先驱者先祖之根中。现在，蜂巢女皇回到了她子民的怀抱！她塑造了族群，族群塑造了她…我们团结的意志…[br/][br/]我们是奇尔寇！

Swarm Seer is a title
Cekto Xa’To is a female Kir'Ko
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko

Once more, our people have defended their independence and freedom. Never again shall any Kir’Ko be a slave – not to a human, not to their empire, not even to our own Queen of Queens. Maybe one day Cekto Xa’To’s vision of a new Hive will become reality. Until then, we must rely on our newfound strength and let go of a past that can never return.
我们再一次捍卫了我们的独立和自由。任何人都不能再次奴役我们，无论是人类还是人类的帝国，甚至连我们自己的至高女皇也不能。也许瑟克托·札托所预见的新蜂巢有一天将会成为现实。到那时，我们必须依赖我们新获得的力量，并且忘记一去不复返的过往。
VO: Male Kir'Ko or Female Kir'Ko
Explore the planet and find answers
发现与传闻有关的更多信息
Surrounded by shady allies, the Syndicate engage in a game of schemes and intrigue.
被阴险的同盟所包围的辛迪加人陷入了一场阴谋与诡计的游戏之中。
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/1
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.14/1

With the acquisition of Zul’s merged Avatar, the future of our House stands at a crossroads. Have we made a pact with the devil? Most likely, as it is only a matter of time until his new sense of power will have corrupted Zul. In his current form he is nothing less but a dormant virus. He is going to betray us sooner or later – which means, we will have to find a way to betray him first!
获得与祖尔结合的化身后，我们家族的未来面临重大的抉择。我们是否和恶魔签下了契约？很有可能，祖尔新获得的力量迟早会令他堕落。他当前的形态就如同一个正在休眠的病毒，迟早会背叛我们。也就是说，我们得找到背叛他的方法，先下手为强！
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/2
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.14/2

Zul is leading us to a planet called CNex-3, one of the central nodes of the old Nexus Network and thus vital part of the most efficient control and propaganda apparatus ever created. The Emperor could hear citizens sneeze at the outer rims of the Borderlands and wish them good health before they could even reach out for a handkerchief . The key to this power was the Nexus Network. A power, I am sure the Emperor won’t mind me borrowing for a few centuries.
祖尔正带领我们前往西奈克斯-3 号星球，这里是古老的通讯网络中央节点之一，因此它也是高效控制和宣传机构的重要组成部分。即使是身处边境之地最边缘的居民打了一个喷嚏，帝皇都能够在他们伸手拿起手帕之前就知晓。这种能力的关键就是通讯网络。我相信，即使我向帝皇借走这种力量用上几个世纪，他也不会介意的。
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/3
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.14/3

It is a thrilling sight to see CNex-3 ahead: Knowing that underneath that immense body of water rests the hardware of a supercomputer whose raw power could make entire oceans boil is exhilarating to say the least. Especially when you are the one to imbue this sleeping giant with new life…
西奈克斯-3 号星球近在眼前的景象令人难以压抑心中的兴奋：在那广袤无垠的水域下，伫立着一台原始力量足以使整个海洋都为之沸腾的超级计算机硬件设备。光是这样说一下都令人欣喜不已，尤其是即将向这个沉睡的巨人灌注新的生命的人是你…
You' refers to player's avatar. This can either be male or female.
VO: Male Syndicate or Female Syndicate
Release Avatar Zul into the Cnex-3 Mainframe
将化身祖尔释放到西奈克斯-3 号星球的主机中
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.16/1
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4197-01.16/1

Success! With Zul’s daemon purged and our own master A.I. inserted in its core, CNex-3 has become property of House Ny’dar. Now all we have to do is wait. Every command post, every communication relay that is reconnected to the Nexus Network will grant us more information, more influence … more control. I will not have to claim my seat within the Ruling Seven - I will be begged to take it!
成功了！祖尔的精灵被清除了，我们自己的主控人工智能也嵌入了西奈克斯-3 号星球的中心，这个星球已经成为了奈达尔家族的财产。现在我们要做的就是等待。每一个指挥前哨和每一个重新与通讯网络建立连接的通讯继电器都将给予我们更多的情报、更广的影响力…以及更强的控制能力。我将不再需要争取政统七族的一席之地，因为他们将会来求我坐上这个席位！
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
On a dead lava-planet the Assembly Second revolt against their creators.
在某个不活跃的熔岩星球上，次代半机械人背叛了他们的缔造者。
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.5.243
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.5.243

Even though L0G3N-1’s betrayal was inexcusable, it has given me a lot to process. As a First, I have always regarded the Second as my children. It was our example that taught them the ways of the Assembly. Now that those children have further radicalized our ideals and rid themselves of the last connection to their pre-Assembly existence – us – I am unable to evaluate if their logic is flawed or we, the First, and our views are indeed outdated.
虽然 L0G3N-1 的背叛不可饶恕，但也让我思考了很多。作为初代半机械人，我一直把次代半机械人视作我的孩子，是我们教会了他们半机械人的处事方式。现在这些孩子把我们的那些理念变得更加激进，并且摆脱了他们与我们初代半机械人之间的最后一丝联系。我无法评估是他们的逻辑存在瑕疵，还是我们初代半机械人和我们的观点确实已经过时了。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.5.248
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.5.248

L0G3N-1 has irrevocably lost his mind. He has summoned all Assembly leaders to Khansu’s Pyre, where we are invited to join him in his newly created linked consciousness – independent from CORE. He has chosen well: The mad tomb world of Khansu’s Children and their imitators is a suitable stage for his lunatic plans to proclaim himself head of the Assembly. Khansu’s Children entombed themselves to wait for their messiah. Now they will receive their salvation as part of the Assembly.
L0G3N-1 已经无药可救了。他把所有的半机械人首领都召集到了坎苏火葬堆，邀请我们加入他新创造的独立于核心的连接意识。他选了一个很好的地方：这个由坎苏后代和他们的效仿者构成的疯狂坟墓星球给他提供了非常合适的环境，让他能够自称为半机械人的首领并实现他那疯狂的计划。坎苏的后代将自己埋葬于此并等待着他们的救世主，现在他们将获得拯救，成为半机械人的一份子。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.5.250
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.5.250
We are approaching Khansu’s Pyre. Our scans revealed that multiple vessels have made their landing on the planet within the last 24 hours. Getting to L0G3N-1 will be challenging. But we will succeed.
我们即将抵达坎苏火葬堆。扫描显示过去 24 小时内曾有多艘飞船在此着陆。寻找 L0G3N-1 之路将充满挑战，但我们会成功的。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 13.7.486
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 13.7.486

L0G3N-1 is dead. It is a shame it had to come to this, but his actions left me no choice. Now, with the Neural Plexus recovered, the future of the Assembly is secured. Other species worship their deities as distant beings, inaccessible by mere mortals. Once I have reached Union Prime, the Assembly will be able to share their thoughts directly with our God – and we will never be separated again.
L0G3N-1 已经死了。很遗憾必须以这样的方式收场，但他的所作所为确实让我别无他法。现在，我们获得了神经丛，半机械人的未来得到了保障。其他种族崇拜神灵，并把神灵当作遥远且凡人无法触及的存在。当我抵达联盟主星后，半机械人将能够直接与我们的神共享思维。我们再也不会分开了。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly

The Assembly synergize. The First and Second have aligned their objective and connected in L0G3N-1’s mind net as one. It is a fascinating experience that will revolutionize our data exchange once we can exploit its full potential. One by one, we will process the planets of the Star Union until the Reassembly of all races is complete. Destruction leads to life. Reassembly to evolution. Chaos brings order and death immortality.
半机械人达成了一致。初代半机械人和次代半机械人有了一致的目标，他们与 L0G3N-1 的思维网络连成了一体。这一经历令人着迷，当我们能够发掘它的全部潜能时，我们的数据交换将发生翻天覆地的变化。我们将对星际联盟的各个星球进行处理，直到所有种族都完成改造。毁灭带来生命，改造带来进化，混乱带来秩序，死亡带来永生。
VO: Male Assembly or Female Assembly
All factions meet in a final battle for the future of the Star Union.
所有阵营为了星际联盟的未来在最后的决战中会面。
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 14.0.304
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 14.0.304
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4198-05.07/3
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4198-05.07/3

We were travelling the Nexus Network towards Union Prime when we got pulled in by one of the Void Torrents. Our ship was launched down the funnel until we were spilled out by what can only be described as a super-sized Spatial Rift, lingering like a menacing cloud that could at any moment turn into a violent storm.
我们正顺着通讯网络前往联盟主星时，突然遭到一股虚空洪流的牵扯。我们的飞船被吸入了漏斗般的洪流之中，然后从一个巨大的空间裂隙里冲了出来。裂隙那就如同可怕的云层，仿佛随时都会变成一场剧烈的风暴。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 14.0.306
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 14.0.306
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4198-05.07/4
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4198-05.07/4

We’ve got company. In the few minutes since our arrival the rift already spilled out dozens of damaged or destroyed vessels, slowly turning this area into a scrapyard. I recognize ship designs from all across the Union, though some debris seems completely alien. By the looks of it this rift may not only be the new central hub of the Nexus Network, but of the funnels and torrents within the Void itself.
我们有伴了。在我们抵达后的短短几分钟内，就有很多受损或已经毁坏的飞船从裂隙中喷涌而出，把这个地方慢慢地变成了一个垃圾场。我认得这些飞船上的标志，它们都来自联盟各个地方，但有些残骸却看起来非常陌生。这个裂隙看来不只是通讯网络新的中心，还是虚空本身的漏斗和洪流。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race
Assembly First - Internal Voice Log: Entry 14.0.313
初代半机械人 - 内部语音日志：条目 14.0.313
Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4198-05.07/9
奈达尔家族编年史 - 个人日志条目 4198-05.07/9

Some of the stranded ships have started moving towards Mora Secundis, the capital world of this region. Once a thriving, metropolitan planet, Mora Secundis appears to be shredded in space, only parts of it still clutching at the strings of this reality. Deadly or not, its position next to the super-rift now makes it the most important target within the entire Union.
有些搁浅的飞船已经开始朝这片区域的首府星球莫拉塞坎迪斯而去了。那里曾是一个繁荣兴盛的首府星球，如今似乎已经在太空中被撕成了碎片，只剩下部分仍然残留在这个现实里。由于星球正好位于巨大裂隙的附近，所以无论莫拉塞坎迪斯星本身有多么危险，它也已经成为了整个联盟中最重要的争夺目标。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race

The race is on and we are only one in a dozen. I don’t know which battles lie ahead or what enemies we are about to face, but I feel that for the better or the worse the future of the Star Union will be decided here on Mora Secundis.
争夺之战已经打响，众多势力汇聚一堂。我不知道前边会面临怎样的战斗和敌人，但我有一种感觉，星际联盟的未来无论是好是坏，都将在莫拉塞坎迪斯上决定。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race
Survive the Battle for Mora Secundis
在莫拉塞坎迪斯星的战斗中存活

Our machine overlord has been beaten back to the darkest corners of the Nexus. All hail Empress Carminia, the shining star that lead the revolution against her own empire. She sacrificed much, but under her guidance we will rise to build a new, better Union. A place, where life is sacred, a place that shields us from the demons beyond.
那位机器霸主已经被打回到了通讯网络中最黑暗的角落。女皇凯米尼亚万岁，她如同一颗闪亮的星辰引领着自己帝国的革命。她牺牲了太多，但在她的指引下我们将崛起并重建一个更好的新联盟。在那里，所有的生命都是神圣的；在那里，我们将不再惧怕恶魔的侵扰。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race

Carminia has been cast into the Void. She sacrificed billions in order to maintain her position, and was the last, ultimate embodiment of humanity’s corruptive power. The Union already built a better leader. CORE does not reign over us: We are CORE. Each day we are getting stronger. Guided by our collective knowledge and unified ideals we march into a new age.
凯米尼亚已经被放逐到了虚空之中。她牺牲了无数的生命来维持她的地位，她将是最后一个人类堕落力量的终极化身。联盟已经制造出了一位更好的首领，核心不会统治我们，因为我们就是核心。每一天我们都变得更加强大，我们将在集体知识和统一的理念指引下迈入新的时代。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race

CORE and Carminia have been beaten back by the forces of freedom. Finally, all factions can start to shape their own future, independent from the choking powers that reigned over the Star Union. We will form a confederation that rises to defend our freedom and diversity. If we develop our unique strengths, we can stand prepared for the threats that may emerge from the Void.
自由的力量战胜了核心和凯米尼亚。所有阵营终于从统治星际联盟那令人窒息的力量中解脱了出来，我们将打造属于自己的未来。我们将组成一个能够捍卫我们自由和多样性的联邦。如果我们能发展自己的独特优势，我们就能准备好迎接来自虚空的任何威胁。
This can be spoken by any gender, except for Amazon which is just female.
VO: Male or Female from any race

General Loca Notes for this XML: For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
In the text below, text is spoken by a character who can be either male or female (except for Amazon, which is always female). If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
